titleStmt.title: SII 8.68: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 68. (A.R. No. 479 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṉṉi vaḷara Irunila maṭan=taiyum poṟceyap pāvaiyuñ cīrtanic celvi yun=taṉ perun=te viyarāki Iṉpuṟa neṭutiyal lūḻiyil liṭaituṟaiñāṭu n=tuṭarvaṉavelip paṭar vaṉavāciyuñ cuḷḷiccūḻ matiḷ koḷḷippāk=kaiyum naṇṇaṟkarumuraṇ maṇṇaik=kaṭak=kamum perukaṭal liḻattaraicar tammuṭiyu māṅkavar teviyar roṅkeḻilmuṭiyu muṉnavarpakkal teṉnavar vaitta cun=taramuṭiyu min=tiranāramum teṉṟicai Iḻaḻamaṇṭala muḻuvatum Eṟipaṭaik keraḷaṉ muṟaimaiyil cūṭuṅ kulataṉamākiya palar pukaḻ muṭiyuñ ceṅkatir mālaiyuñ caṅkatir velait tolperuṅ kāvaṟ pal paḻan=tivum ceruviṟ cinavil Irupattorukā laraicukaḷai kaṭṭa paracurāmaṉ melvaruñ cān=timaṟṟivaraṇ karuti yiruttiya cempoṟ riruttaku muṭiyum payaṅkoṭu paḻimika muyaṅkiyil mutukiṭ ṭoḷitta cayaciṅka ṉaḷapperum pukaḻḻoṭum piṭiyal yiraṭṭapāṭi Eḻaraiyilakkamum navanetik kulapperumalaikaḷum vik=kiramavirac cakkarak=koṭṭamum mutirpaṭavallai maturamaṇṭalamum kāmiṭaivaḷa nāmaṇaikkoṇaiyum veñcilaivirar pañcappaḷḷiyum pācaṭaipaḻana mācuṇitecamum Ayarvil vaṇkīrtti Ātiñakaravaiyiṟ can=tiran ṟolkulat tin=tirarataṉai viṉaiyamar k=kaḷattuk kiḷaiyoṭum piṭittup palataṉattoṭu niṟai kulataṉak kuvaiyuṅ kiṭṭaruñ ceṟimiḷai Oṭṭaviṣaiyamum pūcurarcer nalkkocalaināṭu n=taṉmapālaṉai vemmuṉai yaḻittu vaṇṭuṟaicolait taṇṭapputtiyum Iraṇacūraṉai muraṇuṟat tākkit tikkaṉai kirtti takkaṇalāṭamum kovin=tacan=tan māviḻin=toṭat taṅkāta cāral vaṅkāḷatecamum toṭukaḻal caṅkoṭṭal mahivāḷaṉai veñcamarviḷākat tañcuvattaruḷi Oṇṭiṟal liyāṉaiyum peṇṭir paṇṭāramum nittila neṭuṅkaṭal luttiralāṭamum veṟimalart tirttat teṟipuṉal kaṅkaiyum Alaikaṭal naṭuvuḷ palakalañ celutti caṅkarāmavicaiyottuṅkapaṉmanākiya kiṭārattaraicaṉai vākayamporukaṭal kumpakkariyoṭumakappaṭut turimaiyil piṟakkiya peruneti piṟakkamum Ārttavan nakarnakarp porttoḻil vācalil viccātiratoraṇamum moyttoḷir puṉaimatip puṉavamum kaṉamaṇik katavamum niṟai cirvicaiyamu ṇuṟainīrppaṉṉaiyum vaṉmalaiyūrraiyiṟ ṟoṉmalaiyūrum kalaṅkā valviṉai yilaṅkācokamum kāppuṟu niṟaipunal māppappāḷamum kāvalam puricai mevilipaṅkamum viḷaippattūṟuṭai
tirtamāvalviṉai mātamaliṅkamum kālāmutir kaṭun=tiṟal lilāmulitecamum tenakkalarpoḻil mānakkavāramum toṭukaḻaṟkāvaṟ kaṭumuraṭ kaṭāramum māpporutaṇṭāṟ koṇṭa kopparakecaripanmarāṉa Uṭaiyār śrīrājentracoḻadevaṟkku yāṇṭu 2 10 7Āvatu maturān=takavaḷanāṭṭup peṇṇai vaṭakarait tiruvaṇṇāmalaiUṭaiyār tevakanmikaḷukkut tiruvaṇṇāmalai viyāpāri vayiri Arayaṉum Aṭaik=kalavaṉ paṭiyaṉum vikkiramātittaṉ marutamāṇikkamum koyil tiruvāliyum cāttaṉ Aṭaik=kalamum kāvaṉ kuṭṭeṟaṉum mātevaṉ viḷak=kaṉum Uḷḷiṭṭa nakarattom Oṭṭik kaittiṭ ṭiṭṭukkuṭutta paricāvatu tiruvaṇṇāmalaiUṭaiyār tevatāṉam Iṉṉāṭṭu muḷḷūr yāṇṭu 2 10 7Āvatu mutal Ūr Aṭaṅkalum Eṅkaḷ Ūroṭum kūṭa kaḻikka koṇṭu Immuḷḷūrk kaḻaṉikku Iṉṉāṭṭu māttūr Eriyil vaṭatūmpāṟu nir pāccikkoṇṭu veṇṭum payirceytu Aṉupavittu Ivvūr taṉ kaṭamaiyum Ūrkkaḻañcu kumarakaccāṇamum taṟiiṟai taṭṭārppāṭṭamum Uḷḷiṭṭa Epperppaṭṭa Iṟaikaḷukkumāka Ittevar Uttaramayaṉacaṅkiramattilum dekṣaṇamayaṉacaṅkiramattilum sahasrakalaca māṭiyaruḷukaikkum perun=tiruvamutu ceytaruḷukaikkum Āka Atikārikaḷ coḻamaṇṭalattu Uyyakkoṇṭārvaḷanāṭṭut tiruvaḻun=tūrnāṭṭu Arin=tavaṉnallūr Uṭaiyār nīlaṉ veṇkāṭaṉārāṉa rājarājamuven=taveḷār ceyta nivan=tappaṭi poṉ muppattiru kaḻañcum Ittevar paṇṭārattukkallāl tuḷaiyoṭum Uraiyokkum poṉṉey Āṭṭāṇṭutoṟum can=tirātittaval tevar paṇṭārattey vaippatākavum Ipparicu kal veṭṭikkoḷḷappeṟuvārkaḷākavum Icain=tu kaittiṭṭiṭṭukkuṭuttom tevakanmikaḷukkut tiruvaṇṇāmalai viyāpāri vayiri Arayaṉum Aṭaikkalavaṉ paṭiyaṉum vikkiramātittaṉ marutamāṇikkamum koyil tiruvāliyum cātta ṉaṭaikkalamum kāvaṉ kuṭṭeṟaṉum māteva ḷiṭṭa nakarattom . Ivarkaḷ colla Eḻutiṉeṉ cirutaṉattup puravuvaritiṇaikkaḷattuk kaṇakku coḻamaṇṭalattu Arumoḻitevavaḷanāṭṭup puṟaṅkarampaināṭṭuk kuḻalūr Uṭaiyāṉ mavilai Ākkāṉeṉ Ivai Eṉ ṉeḻuttu . Ipparicu Icain=tu kaittiṭṭuk kuṭuttamaikku Ivvūr viyāpāri Aṭaikkalavaṉ paṭiyaṉeṉ Ivai Eṉ Eḻuttu . Ipparicu Icain=tu kaittiṭṭuk kuṭuttamai
Ippaṭi yāṇṭu 2 10 7Avatu ḷ 100 2 10 8ṉāl kalveṭṭiyatu . ḷ 1 ṉāl Atikārikaḷ rājarājamuven=taveḷār maturān=takavaḷanāṭṭup peṇṇaivaṭakarait tiruvaṇṇāmalai Uṭaiyār koyiliṉuḷḷāl Ōlakkakūṭattiṉ muṉpirun=tu kaṇakku keṭṭu Ittevar tevatāṉam kiḻaṇṇāttu nilattil Ātippuliyūruṭaiyāṉ kovaṉāccaṉāṉa kaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻa Aṇimurināṭāḻvāṉ kalluvitta Amarttikaṇṭappererikkiḻ nilattil yāṇṭu 2 10 7Āvatu nāḷ nūṟṟorupattoṉpatumutal tiruttalām nilattil Ittevark=ku śrīkāryañceyvāṉ Oruvaṉukku nāl Oṉṟiṉuk=ku nellu tūṇippatakkāka nāḷ muṉṉūṟṟaṟupatiṉuk=ku nellu nūṟṟeṇpatiṉ kalattuk=ku nila muveliyum Ittevark=ku muṉpu kaṇakkeḻuti varuvāṉ Oruvaṉuk=ku meleṟṟam kaṇakkeḻutuvāṉ Oruvaṉuk=ku nellup patakkāka nāḷ muṉṉūṟṟaṟupatiṉuk=ku nellu Aṟupatiṉ kalattuk=ku nilam veliyum Āka Iṉnila nālveliyum nikki niṉṟa nilattil yāṇṭu Irupatteḻāvatu nāḷ nūṟṟorupatteṭṭuvarai nilam kāṭu veṭṭit tiruttip payirceyta nilattālum Iṉṉāḷ mutal tiruttip payirceyyum nilattālum Umaytāsarikkut teṟkuppaṭṭa kollainilattil payirceyta nilattālum payirceyyum nilattālum Avvav Āṇṭukaḷ ceyta pokaṅkaḷil svāmipokattāl van=ta nellum poṉṉuṅ koṇṭu kārttikait tirunāḷilum paṅkuṉit tirunāḷilum tiruvaṇṇāmalaiyuṭaiyāraic cevikka van=ta civacokikaḷ Uḷḷiṭṭa Aṭiyārai Ūṭṭuka veṉṟum puṟattaṭiyārk=ku koṟṟaṭṭuka veṉṟum Ittevar tevatāṉam vāmaṉpūṇṭiyāṉa puliyūrnāṭiccaruppetimaṅkalattuc cavaiyār kaṭava Ūrkkaḻañcāluṅ kumarakaccāṇattāluṅ kaṭava poṉ nāṟkaḻañcum nāvaṟpūṇṭiyāṉa vayiramekaccaruppetimaṅkalattuc cavaiyār meṟpaṭi kaṭava poṉ nāṟkaḻañcum kiḻaṇṇāttūrār meṟpaṭi kaṭava poṉ nāṟkaḻañcum tiruvaṇṇāmalai nakarattār meṟpaṭi kaṭava poṉ nāṟkaḻañcum vaicca pūṇṭiŪrār meṟpaṭi kaṭava poṉ nāṟkaḻañcum pūṇṭi Ūrār meṟpaṭi kaṭava poṉ Irukaḻañcum paṅkaḷanāṭṭuk kuṇṭur murukaṭiccaruppetimaṅkalattuc capaiyār meṟpaṭi kaṭava poṉ nāṟkaḻañcum Ākak kaṭava poṉ Irupattaṟu kaḻañcum Ittevar paṇṭārattukkallāl tuḷaiyoṭu Uraiyokkum poṉne Ittevar paṇṭārattuk=ku Uṭalākat taṇṭi Ippoṉṉāl Ittevar koyilile
viḷak koṉṟiṉukku ney yuriyāka nāḷoṉṟiṉuk=ku naṟuney nāḻiyāka nāḷ muṉṉūṟ ṟaṟupatiṉuk=ku ney muṉṉūṟ ṟaṟupati ṉāḻiyiṉāl poṉ kaḻañciṉuk=ku ney Aṟupati ṉāḻiyāka poṉ Aṟukaḻañcum viḷak=ku Oṉṟiṉuk=ku kaṟpūram mañcāṭiĀka viḷak=ku Iraṇṭiṉuk=ku Orunāḷaik=ku kaṟpūram Iraṇṭumañcāṭiyāka nāḷ muṉṉūṟṟaṟupatiṉuk=ku kaṟpūram muppattaṟu kaḻañcum Uṭaiyār tirumeyppūccuk=ku Orunāḷ sandhināliṉuk=ku kaṟpūram nālumañcāṭiyāka nāḷ muṉṉūṟ ṟaṟupatiṉuk=ku kaṟpūram Eḻupattiru kaḻañcum Āka kaṟpūram nūṟ ṟeṇkaḻañciṉāl poṉ kaḻañcukku kaṟpūram Aṟukaḻañcākap poṉ patineṇ kaḻañcumāka kaḻañcum nikkip poṉ Irukaḻañcum paṇṭārattuk=ku mutalākavumāka Ippaṭi nivan=tamākak koṇṭu Iṭṭapaṭi cantirātittavaṟ ceykaveṉṟum Ippaṭi ceyvataṟkuk kalveṭṭuka veṉṟum Atikārikaḷ coḻamaṇṭalattu Uyyakkoṇṭārvaḷanāṭṭut tiruvaḻuntūrnāṭṭu Arin=tamanallūruṭaiyāṉ nilaṉ veṇkāṭaṉāṉa rājarājamuventaveḷār Ipparicu ceyvitāka kal veṭṭuvittom tevarkaṉmikaḷom .
Digital edition of SII 8.68 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
